item.title: Improving your git efficiency using git alias
item.description: Have you ever felt like typing out git commands requires too much effort, yet you don't want to switch to a GUI because that brings it's own set of problems? Have you tried using git aliases to make your workflow more efficient? Over the last couple of weeks I've shown many people how I'm using git alias to improve my workflows, if you're interested in improving your workflow, watch this video ðŸ’ªðŸ˜…
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Goodbye Microsoft Teams bar... Hello Productivity
item.description: We've all been there, you're in a meeting, you start sharing your screen and things are going great... next up you need to do something at the top of your screen and you can't because the Microsoft Teams bar is in the way. You can't move it, you can't hide it, you can't do anything about it. Or can you?
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
